Bsp_VidDecVideoStatus Struct Reference
External Device Interface API » External Video Decoder API

Status for IOCTL_BSP_VID_DEC_GET_VIDEO_STATUS. More...

#include <bsp_videoDecoder.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 isVideoDetect

Detailed Description

Status for IOCTL_BSP_VID_DEC_GET_VIDEO_STATUS.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecVideoStatus::frameHeight

Frame or field height in lines

This is detected video signal frame or field height. Further change in width or height due to additional cropping, scaling like CIF, HALF-D1 is not accoutned for in this field

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecVideoStatus::frameInterval

Interval between two fields or frames in micro-seconds

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecVideoStatus::frameWidth

Frame or field width in pixels

This is detected video signal frame or field width. Further change in width or height due to additional cropping, scaling like CIF, HALF-D1 is not accoutned for in this field

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecVideoStatus::isInterlaced

TRUE: Source is Interlaced, FALSE: Source is Progressive

UInt32 Bsp_VidDecVideoStatus::isVideoDetect

TRUE: Video signal is present, FALSE: no video signal
